tweet_text.57673: it was mentioned that lots of recent cases acquired the virus while in hspitl. or in contact with MERS pos. cases!
tweet_text.57683: The latest cases bring the total number of confirmed MERS cases in Saudi Arabia to 272 of whom 81 have died. Fatality rate=30%.
tweet_text.57759: We need viral sequence to follow spread of the virus.  Hopefully that is underway. Very worrying if all genetically linked
